document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclator, geographic and stratigraphic distribution of the family Triphoridae (Mollusca: Gastropoda)

bibRefCitation.author: Gould, A. A.

Triformis
clathratus Gould, 1861

, pl. 13, fig. 1.

Inella clathratus ( Gould, 1861 )

subSubSection.paragraph:
Type material.
Redpath Museum 5240, original no. USNM 330 C.S. , holotype
.

Remarks . The genus
Triforis
is of feminine gender, the name should thus be
Triforis clathrata
. Kosuge (1965) considered
Euthymella lutea Kosuge, 1962 a
synonym of
T. clathrata
.
